GAMEPLAY_AuroraEnergyDrinkDescription.English: Might keep you awake for a few more hours, but this won't make you fly.
GAMEPLAY_AuroraEnergyDrinkDescription.German: Hält dich vielleicht für ein paar Stunden wach, aber wird dich nicht fliegen lassen.
GAMEPLAY_AuroraEnergyDrinkDescription.Russian: Он может заставить вас бодрствовать ещё несколько часов, но он не заставит вас летать.
GAMEPLAY_AuroraEnergyDrinkDescription.Polish: Może pomóc Ci zachować przytomność na parę godzin, ale nie doda Ci skrzydeł.
GAMEPLAY_AuroraEnergyDrinkDescription.French (France): Ça peut vous tenir éveillé quelques heures de plus, mais ça ne vous donnera pas des ailes.
GAMEPLAY_AuroraEnergyDrinkDescription.Turkish: Seni birkaç saat daha uyanık tutabilir ama bu seni uçurmaz.
GAMEPLAY_AuroraEnergyDrinkDescription.Korean: 당신에게 날개를 달아줄 순 없지만, 몇 시간정도 깨어있는덴 도움이 됩니다.
GAMEPLAY_AuroraEnergyDrinkDescription.Italian: Potrebbe tenerti sveglio qualche ora in più, ma non ti farà crescere le ali.

GAMEPLAY_BeerBottleDescription.English:
A nice bottle of beer.
Have a cold one!

Alcohol 5% vol
GAMEPLAY_BeerBottleDescription.German:
Eine schöne Flasche Bier.
Gönn' Dir ein kühles Blondes!

Alkohol 5% vol
GAMEPLAY_BeerBottleDescription.Russian:
Хорошая бутылка пива.
Холодный!
Содержит 5% алкоголя.
GAMEPLAY_BeerBottleDescription.French (France):
Une bonne bouteille de bière.
Buvez-en une fraîche ! 

Alcool 5% vol.
GAMEPLAY_BeerBottleDescription.Turkish: A nice bottle of beer. Soğuk olsun! %5 Oranında alkol içerir.!
GAMEPLAY_BeerBottleDescription.Italian:
Una buona bottiglia di birra.
Da bere fredda!
Alcol 5% vol.

GAMEPLAY_BreadDescription.English: A loaf of generic white bread.
GAMEPLAY_BreadDescription.French (France): Une miche de pain blanc générique.
GAMEPLAY_BreadDescription.Italian: Una fetta di pane bianco generico.

GAMEPLAY_CannedChiliDescription.German: Deftig. Wärmend. Balsam für die Seele. Chili!
GAMEPLAY_CannedChiliDescription.Turkish: Doyurucu, Isıtıcı, Ruh yatıştırıcı Acı biber!
GAMEPLAY_CannedChiliDescription.Italian: Ricco. Caloroso. Scalda persino l'anima. Chili!

GAMEPLAY_CannedSpaghettiDescription.Turkish: İçinde Köfte Olan Lezzetli Hazır Spagetti !

GAMEPLAY_CannedStewDescription.English: A hearty meal with meat and vegetables. Good enough to forget about everything else for little while.
GAMEPLAY_CannedStewDescription.German: Ein anständiges Essen mit Fleisch und Gemüse. Gut genug um alles andere für einen kurzen Moment zu vergessen.
GAMEPLAY_CannedStewDescription.Russian: Сытный обед с мясом и овощами. Достаточно хорошо, чтобы на время забыть обо всём остальном.
GAMEPLAY_CannedStewDescription.Polish: Krzepiący posiłek z mięsem i warzywami. Wystarczy, by na chwilé zapomnieć o wszystkim innym.
GAMEPLAY_CannedStewDescription.French (France): Un repas copieux avec de la viande et des légumes. Assez bon pour oublier tout le reste pendant un petit moment.
GAMEPLAY_CannedStewDescription.Turkish: Et ve sebze ile doyurucu bir yemek. Kısa bir süre için diğer her şeyi unutacak kadar iyi.
GAMEPLAY_CannedStewDescription.Korean: 고기와 야채가 들어간 푸짐한 한 끼. 잠시나마 세상의 고난을 잊게해줍니다.
GAMEPLAY_CannedStewDescription.Italian: Un pasto salutare con carne e verdure. Buono abbastanza da farti dimenticare del resto per un po'.

GAMEPLAY_CatFoodDescription.English:
A can of cat food.
Smells terrible and will probably taste even worse.
GAMEPLAY_CatFoodDescription.German:
Eine Dose Katzenfutter.
Riecht furchtbar und wird sicherlich noch viel schlechter schmecken.
GAMEPLAY_CatFoodDescription.Russian:
Банка кошачьего корма.
Пахнет ужасно, вероятно, вкус ещё хуже.
GAMEPLAY_CatFoodDescription.Polish:
Puszka kociej karmy.
Okropnie śmierdzi, pewnie smakuje jeszcze gorzej.
GAMEPLAY_CatFoodDescription.French (France):
Une boîte de nourriture pour chat.
Ça sent mauvais et ça aura probablement un goût encore pire.
GAMEPLAY_CatFoodDescription.Turkish:
Bir kutu kedi maması.
Çok kötü kokuyor ve tadı muhtemelen çok kötü olsa gerek !
GAMEPLAY_CatFoodDescription.Korean:
캔에 담긴 고양이 밥
냄새가 끔찍하지만 맛은 더합니다.
GAMEPLAY_CatFoodDescription.Italian:
Una lattina di cibo per gatti.
Ha un odore terribile e probabilmente un gusto ancora peggiore.

GAMEPLAY_CerealDescription.English: A big box of cereal. Very dry.
GAMEPLAY_CerealDescription.German: Eine große Packung Frühstücksflocken. Sehr trocken.
GAMEPLAY_CerealDescription.French (France): Une grosse boîte de céréales. Très sec.
GAMEPLAY_CerealDescription.Turkish: Büyük bir kutu mısır gevreği. Çok kuru.
GAMEPLAY_CerealDescription.Italian: Una grossa scatola di cereali. Molto secchi

GAMEPLAY_CookiesDescription.English: A little stale, but they still taste good.
GAMEPLAY_CookiesDescription.German: Ein bisschen trocken, aber sie schmecken immer noch gut.
GAMEPLAY_CookiesDescription.Russian: Немного несвежие, но всё равно вкусные.
GAMEPLAY_CookiesDescription.Polish: Odrobinę zwietrzałe, ale nadal nieźle smakują.
GAMEPLAY_CookiesDescription.French (France): Un peu rassis, mais ils ont toujours bon goût.
GAMEPLAY_CookiesDescription.Turkish: Biraz bayat ama yine de tadı güzel.
GAMEPLAY_CookiesDescription.Korean: 조금 오래된 것 같지만, 아직도 맛은 있습니다.
GAMEPLAY_CookiesDescription.Italian: Un po' stantii, ma hanno ancora un buon sapore

GAMEPLAY_CornflakesDescription.English: A big box of crispy cornflakes. Very dry.
GAMEPLAY_CornflakesDescription.German: Eine große Packung Cornflakes. Sehr trocken.
GAMEPLAY_CornflakesDescription.Russian: Большая коробка хрустящих кукурузных хлопьев. Очень сухие.
GAMEPLAY_CornflakesDescription.French (France): Une grosse boîte de cornflakes croustillants. Très sec.
GAMEPLAY_CornflakesDescription.Turkish: Büyük bir kutu mısır gevreği. Çok kuru.
GAMEPLAY_CornflakesDescription.Korean: 박스에 담긴 바삭한 콘프레이크. 매우 건조합니다.
GAMEPLAY_CornflakesDescription.Italian: Una grossa confezione di cornflakes croccanti. Molto secchi.

GAMEPLAY_CupMilkDescription.English: Well, it tastes better than boiled water.
GAMEPLAY_CupMilkDescription.German: Naja, schmeckt besser als abgekochtes Wasser
GAMEPLAY_CupMilkDescription.French (France): Eh bien, ça a meilleur goût que l'eau bouillie.
GAMEPLAY_CupMilkDescription.Italian: Bhè, ha un gusto migliore dell'acqua bollita.

GAMEPLAY_DryMilkPacketDescription.English: A packet of dried milk powder.
GAMEPLAY_DryMilkPacketDescription.French (France): Un paquet de lait en poudre.
GAMEPLAY_DryMilkPacketDescription.Italian: Una confezione di latte in polvere.

GAMEPLAY_ForsakenSpiritsDescription.English: Life is better on the edge. Contains 5% alcohol.
GAMEPLAY_ForsakenSpiritsDescription.Russian: Жизнь лучше на грани. Содержит 5% спирта.
GAMEPLAY_ForsakenSpiritsDescription.French (France): On ne vie qu'une fois. Contient 5% d'alcool.
GAMEPLAY_ForsakenSpiritsDescription.Turkish: Hayat kenarda daha iyidir. %5 alkollü İçeçecek
GAMEPLAY_ForsakenSpiritsDescription.Italian: La vita è più bella se vissuta sul filo del rasoio. Contiene il 5% di alcol.

GAMEPLAY_HoneyJarDescription.English: A true lifesaver! Honey provides calories, vitamins, minerals and will never spoil!
GAMEPLAY_HoneyJarDescription.German: Ein echter Lebensretter! Honig liefert Kalorien, Vitamine, Mineralien und verdirbt nicht!
GAMEPLAY_HoneyJarDescription.Russian: Настоящее спасение! Мёд содержит калории, витамины, минералы и никогда не испортится!
GAMEPLAY_HoneyJarDescription.Polish: Uratuje Ci życie. Miód dostarcza kalorii, witamin, minerałów - i nigdy się nie psuje.
GAMEPLAY_HoneyJarDescription.French (France): Il peut vous sauver la vie ! Le miel fournit des calories, des vitamines, des minéraux et ne se périme jamais !
GAMEPLAY_HoneyJarDescription.Turkish: Gerçek bir cankurtaran! Bal; kalori, vitamin, mineral sağlar ve asla bozulmaz!
GAMEPLAY_HoneyJarDescription.Korean: 진정한 생명의 은인! 칼로리, 비타민, 미네랄을 섭취할 수 있으며 심지어 상하지도 않습니다!
GAMEPLAY_HoneyJarDescription.Italian: Un vero salva vita! Il miele contiene calorie, vitamine, minerali e non va mai a male!

GAMEPLAY_HotCocoaBagDescription.English: Eine Packung für die Herstellung von heißem Kakao.
GAMEPLAY_HotCocoaBagDescription.French (France): Un sachet pour faire du chocolat chaud.
GAMEPLAY_HotCocoaBagDescription.Turkish: Sıcak Kakao yapmak için bir paket.
GAMEPLAY_HotCocoaBagDescription.Korean: 핫초코를 만들 수 있는 코코아 분말팩
GAMEPLAY_HotCocoaBagDescription.Italian: Una bustina per fare la cioccolata calda.

GAMEPLAY_HotCocoaBoxDescription.English: A box of packets for making Hot Cocoa.
GAMEPLAY_HotCocoaBoxDescription.German: Eine Schachtel mit Päckchen für die Herstellung von Hot Cocoa.
GAMEPLAY_HotCocoaBoxDescription.Russian: Коробка с пакетиками для приготовления горячего какао.
GAMEPLAY_HotCocoaBoxDescription.French (France): Une boîte de sachets pour faire du chocolat chaud.
GAMEPLAY_HotCocoaBoxDescription.Turkish: Sıcak Kakao yapmak için bir kutu Kakao !
GAMEPLAY_HotCocoaBoxDescription.Korean: 핫초코를 만들 수 있는 코코아 분말상자
GAMEPLAY_HotCocoaBoxDescription.Italian: Una scatola con le bustine per fare la cioccolata calda.

GAMEPLAY_HotCocoaCupDescription.English: A delicious cup of your favorite hot cocoa.
GAMEPLAY_HotCocoaCupDescription.German: Eine köstliche Tasse Ihres heißen Lieblingskakaos.
GAMEPLAY_HotCocoaCupDescription.Polish: Kubek przepysznego kakao, Twój ulubiony rodzaj.
GAMEPLAY_HotCocoaCupDescription.French (France): Une délicieuse tasse de votre chocolat chaud préféré.
GAMEPLAY_HotCocoaCupDescription.Turkish: En sevdiğiniz sıcak kakaodan lezzetli bir fincan.
GAMEPLAY_HotCocoaCupDescription.Italian: Una deliziosa tazza della vostra cioccolata calda preferita.

GAMEPLAY_ModChocolateBarDescription.English: Dark and full of caffeine. Gives a little boost when you're tired.
GAMEPLAY_ModChocolateBarDescription.German: Dunkel und voller Koffein. Gibt einen kleinen Schub, wenn Sie müde sind.
GAMEPLAY_ModChocolateBarDescription.Russian: Тёмный и полный кофеина. Даёт небольшой заряд бодрости, если вы устали.
GAMEPLAY_ModChocolateBarDescription.French (France): Noir et plein de caféine. Ça donne un petit coup de fouet quand on est fatigué.
GAMEPLAY_ModChocolateBarDescription.Turkish: Siyah ve kafein dolu Çikolata Barı. Yorgun olduğunuzda biraz destek verir.
GAMEPLAY_ModChocolateBarDescription.Korean: 다량의 카페인이 함유된 다크 초콜릿. 지친 몸에 약간의 각성을 줍니다.
GAMEPLAY_ModChocolateBarDescription.Italian: Amara e ricca di caffeina. Dà una po' di energie quando sei stanco.

GAMEPLAY_ModSyrupDescription.English:
Delicious maple syrup. There had to be some around here!
Maple syrup will never spoil!
GAMEPLAY_ModSyrupDescription.Russian:
Вкусный кленовый сироп. Здесь должно быть что-то поблизости!
Кленовый сироп никогда не испортится!
GAMEPLAY_ModSyrupDescription.German:
Köstliches Ahornsirup. Das musste es hier einfach geben.
 Ahornsirup wird niemals schlecht!
GAMEPLAY_ModSyrupDescription.Polish: Pyszny syrop klonowu. Musi być go więcej./nSyrop klonowy nigdy się nie psuje!
GAMEPLAY_ModSyrupDescription.French (France):
Délicieux sirop d'érable. Il devait forcément y en avoir par ici ! 
Le sirop d'érable ne se périme jamais !
GAMEPLAY_ModSyrupDescription.Turkish: Lezzetli akçaağaç şurubu. Buralarda biraz olmalı! Asla bozulmaz!
GAMEPLAY_ModSyrupDescription.Korean:
맛있는 메이플 시럽. 주변에 더 있었어야 했는데!
상하지 않습니다.
GAMEPLAY_ModSyrupDescription.Italian:
Delizioso sciroppo d'acero. Doveva essercene un po' da qualche parte!
Lo sciroppo d'acero non va mai a male!

GAMEPLAY_MountainSodaDescription.French (France): Fait à la montagne. Frais comme la montagne.
GAMEPLAY_MountainSodaDescription.Italian: Fatta in montagna. Fresca di montagna.

GAMEPLAY_RiceCookedDescription.English: Pure cooked white rice is rather dull, but provides good calories.
GAMEPLAY_RiceCookedDescription.German: Reiner gekochter Langkornreis ist ziemlich langweilig, aber liefert wertvolle Kalorien.
GAMEPLAY_RiceCookedDescription.Russian: Чистый приготовленный белый рис довольно тусклый, но содержит много калорий.
GAMEPLAY_RiceCookedDescription.Polish: Sam gotowany ryż jest raczej nudny, ale dostarcza wielu kalorii.
GAMEPLAY_RiceCookedDescription.French (France): Le riz blanc nature est plutôt fade, mais fournit beaucoup de calories.
GAMEPLAY_RiceCookedDescription.Turkish: Saf pişmiş beyaz pirinç oldukça sıkıcıdır, ancak iyi kalori sağlar.
GAMEPLAY_RiceCookedDescription.Korean: 조리된 쌀. 윤기는 없을지라도 칼로리는 높습니다.
GAMEPLAY_RiceCookedDescription.Italian: Il riso cotto sa di poco, ma fornisce una buona quantità di calorie.

GAMEPLAY_RiceRawDescription.English:
One of the most widely consumed staple foods in the world.
Needs to be cooked before it can be eaten: one part rice and two parts water.
GAMEPLAY_RiceRawDescription.German:
Eines der meistkonsumierten Grundnahrungsmittel der Welt.
Muss gekocht werden, bevor er gegessen werden kann: ein Teil Reis und zwei Teile Wasser.
GAMEPLAY_RiceRawDescription.Russian:
Один из наиболее широко потребляемых продуктов питания в мире.
Перед употреблением в пищу необходимо приготовить: одну часть риса и две части воды.
GAMEPLAY_RiceRawDescription.Polish:
Jeden z najczęściej spożywanych pokarmów na świecie.
Należy go ugotować przed jedzeniem:szklanka ryżu i dwie szklanki wody.
GAMEPLAY_RiceRawDescription.French (France):
L'un des aliments de base les plus consommés dans le monde.
Il doit être cuit avant d'être consommé : une part de riz et deux parts d'eau.
GAMEPLAY_RiceRawDescription.Turkish:
Dünyada en çok tüketilen temel gıdalardan biri.
Yenmeden önce pişirilmesi gerekiyor: bir ölçü pirinç ve iki ölçü su.
GAMEPLAY_RiceRawDescription.Korean:
세계에서 가장 많이 소비되는 주식중 하나.
먹기 위해선 조리해야 합니다: 쌀과 물 1대 2비율 조리
GAMEPLAY_RiceRawDescription.Italian:
Uno dei cibi comuni più consumati al mondo.
Deve essere cotto prima di poterlo mangiare: una parte di riso e due parti d'acqua.

GAMEPLAY_SPAMDescription.German: Schweinefleisch in der Dose. Billig und einfach.
GAMEPLAY_SPAMDescription.Russian: Консервы из свинины. Дёшево и просто.
GAMEPLAY_SPAMDescription.Polish: Wieprzowina w puszce. Tania i prosta.
GAMEPLAY_SPAMDescription.French (France): Porc en conserve. Bon marché et simple.
GAMEPLAY_SPAMDescription.Turkish: Konserve domuz eti jambon. Ucuz ve basit.
GAMEPLAY_SPAMDescription.Korean: 돼지고기 통조림. 저렴하고 간단히 먹을 수 있습니다.
GAMEPLAY_SPAMDescription.Italian: Maiale in scatola. Semplice ed economico.

GAMEPLAY_VodkaBottleDescription.English: A bottle of the hard stuff for when you just want to fall over.
GAMEPLAY_VodkaBottleDescription.German: Eine Flasche mit dem harten Zeug, wenn du einfach nur umfallen willst.
GAMEPLAY_VodkaBottleDescription.Russian: Бутылка крепкого напитка для тех случаев, когда вам просто хочется упасть.
GAMEPLAY_VodkaBottleDescription.French (France): Une bouteille d'alcool fort, pour les moments où vous avez juste envie de vous écrouler.
GAMEPLAY_VodkaBottleDescription.Turkish: Sadece düşmek istediğin zamanlar için bir sert şişe Votka
GAMEPLAY_VodkaBottleDescription.Korean: 코가 비뚤어지고 싶을 때를 위한 독한 술
GAMEPLAY_VodkaBottleDescription.Italian: Una bottiglia di roba forte per quando vuoi proprio andare a dormire.

GAMEPLAY_WhiskyFlaskDescription.English:
Smells like Whisky.
Maybe one small sip against the cold fingers...
GAMEPLAY_WhiskyFlaskDescription.German:
Riecht wie Whisky.
Vielleicht ein kleines Schlückchen gegen die kalten Finger...
GAMEPLAY_WhiskyFlaskDescription.Russian:
Пахнет виски.
Может, один маленький глоток поможет согреть замёрзшие пальцы...
GAMEPLAY_WhiskyFlaskDescription.Polish:
Pachnie jak whisky.
Może mały łyczek by ogrzać zmrożone palce...
GAMEPLAY_WhiskyFlaskDescription.French (France):
Sent le whisky.
Peut-être qu'une petite gorgée contre les doigts froids...
GAMEPLAY_WhiskyFlaskDescription.Turkish:
Viski gibi kokuyor.
Belki soğuk parmaklara karşı küçük bir yudum...
GAMEPLAY_WhiskyFlaskDescription.Korean:
위스키 냄새가 납니다
얼어있는 손가락을 녹일 수 있도록 한모금...
GAMEPLAY_WhiskyFlaskDescription.Italian:
Odora di Whisky.
Forse un sorso per scaldarti le dita congelate...

GAMEPLAY_WineBottleDescription.English: A bottle of wine for that big celebration. Don't drink too much at once.
GAMEPLAY_WineBottleDescription.German: Eine Flasche Wein für ein großes Fest. Nicht zu viel auf einmal trinken.
GAMEPLAY_WineBottleDescription.Russian: Бутылка вина для большого праздника. Не пейте сразу слишком много.
GAMEPLAY_WineBottleDescription.Polish: Gdy masz powód do świętowania. Nie wypij wszystkiego na raz!
GAMEPLAY_WineBottleDescription.French (France): Une bouteille de vin pour faire la fête. Ne buvez pas tout d'un coup.
GAMEPLAY_WineBottleDescription.Turkish: Büyük kutlama için bir şişe şarap. Bir seferde çok fazla içmeyin.
GAMEPLAY_WineBottleDescription.Korean: 축배를 들기위한 와인 한 병. 한 번에 너무 많이 마시진 마세요
GAMEPLAY_WineBottleDescription.Italian: Una bottiglia di vino per quell'occasione speciale. Non berne troppo in una volta.

GAMEPLAY_RandomLargeCannedFood.Italian: Grossa confezione di cibo in scatola casuale

GAMEPLAY_RandomLargeCannedFoodDescriptio.English: A spawn point for large canned food items.
GAMEPLAY_RandomLargeCannedFoodDescriptio.Russian: Место появления крупных консервированных продуктов питания.
GAMEPLAY_RandomLargeCannedFoodDescriptio.Turkish: Büyük konserve yiyecekler için bir yumurtlama noktası.
GAMEPLAY_RandomLargeCannedFoodDescriptio.Korean: 무작위 큰 통조림 아이템의 스폰 지점입니다.
GAMEPLAY_RandomLargeCannedFoodDescriptio.Italian: Punto di generazione per grandi confezioni di cibo in scatola.

GAMEPLAY_RandomMediumCannedFood.Italian: Confezione media di cibo in scatola casuale

GAMEPLAY_RandomMediumCannedFoodDescripti.English: A spawn point for medium canned food items.
GAMEPLAY_RandomMediumCannedFoodDescripti.Russian: Место появления средних консервированных продуктов питания.
GAMEPLAY_RandomMediumCannedFoodDescripti.Turkish: Orta boy konserve yiyecekler için bir yumurtlama noktası.
GAMEPLAY_RandomMediumCannedFoodDescripti.Korean: 무작위 중간 통조림 아이템의 스폰 지점입니다.
GAMEPLAY_RandomMediumCannedFoodDescripti.Italian: Punto di generazione per confezioni di cibo in scatola medie.

GAMEPLAY_RandomSodaTallDescription.English: A spawn point for tall soda cans.
GAMEPLAY_RandomSodaTallDescription.Russian: Точка появления высоких банок с газировкой.
GAMEPLAY_RandomSodaTallDescription.Turkish: Uzun soda kutuları için bir yumurtlama noktası.
GAMEPLAY_RandomSodaTallDescription.Korean: 무작위 큰 소다 캔 아이템의 스폰 지점입니다.
GAMEPLAY_RandomSodaTallDescription.Italian: Punto di generazione per grandi bavende in lattina.

GAMEPLAY_RandomSmallPacketDescription.English: A spawn point for small food packets.
GAMEPLAY_RandomSmallPacketDescription.Russian: Точка появления маленьких пакетов с едой.
GAMEPLAY_RandomSmallPacketDescription.Turkish: Küçük yiyecek paketleri için bir yumurtlama noktası.
GAMEPLAY_RandomSmallPacketDescription.Korean: 무작위 소용량 분말팩 아이템의 스폰 지점입니다.
GAMEPLAY_RandomSmallPacketDescription.Italian: Punto di generazione per bustine di cibo.

GAMEPLAY_RandomCerealBoxDescription.English: A spawn point for cereal boxes.
GAMEPLAY_RandomCerealBoxDescription.Turkish: Tahıl kutuları için bir yumurtlama noktası.
GAMEPLAY_RandomCerealBoxDescription.Italian: Punto di generazione per le scatole di cereali.

GAMEPLAY_RandomLiquorBottleDescription.English: A spawn point for liquor bottles.
GAMEPLAY_RandomLiquorBottleDescription.Turkish: İçki şişeleri için bir yumurtlama noktası.
GAMEPLAY_RandomLiquorBottleDescription.Italian: Punto di generazione per bottiglie di liquore.
